name: jeremeamia/acclimate
description: Provides adapters for various frameworks' service containers.

suggest.aura/di: Install Aura.Di to use with the AuraContainerAdapter.
suggest.guzzle/service: Install Guzzle to use with the GuzzleServiceBuilderContainerAdapter
suggest.pimple/pimple: Install Pimple to use with the PimpleContainerAdapter.
suggest.symfony/dependency-injection: Install Symfony DI to use with the SymfonyContainerAdapter.
suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: Install ZF2 Service Manager to use with the Zf2ServiceManagerContainerAdapter.
